title: Interactive Quantum Physics Instructional Design Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Classical Physics Fundamentals and Mathematical Modeling Comprehension
context.additional_context: Personalized learning progress management with real-time feedback systems, facilitating team-based assignments in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of quantum mechanics (superposition, uncertainty, observation effect) with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze quantum mechanics cases via PBL (Problem-Based Learning), producing three-stage reports from experimental design to result interpretation
Learners improve individual knowledge gaps three or more times through concept-prior knowledge-task linkage questions in formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
